attributes.additional_details:
Paul Flynn's minority report to the Public Administration Select Committee sets out both problems with the current system, and proposals for alternatives.

http://paulflynnmp.typepad.com/my_weblog/2016/08/how-to-reform-corrupted-honours-system.html
attributes.background:
David Cameron's resignation list has highlighted that Britain's honours system is corrupt, discredited and elitist.

A new system should be created, independent of politicians, which recognises and rewards true merit.
